Class DisplayReceipt

java.lang.Object
DisplayReceipt
public class DisplayReceipt extends Object
Class responsible for displaying and managing receipt information.

    • load

      public static void load() throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Loads necessary data from the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
      ClassNotFoundException - if the database driver class is not found.

      public static void updateRecipt(javafx.scene.Scene scene)

      Parameters:

    • updateIngredients

      public static void updateIngredients(Entry entry) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Updates the ingredients based on the given entry.
      Parameters:
      entry - The entry containing ingredient information.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
      ClassNotFoundException - if the database driver class is not found.

    • loopEntry

      public static void loopEntry(ArrayList<javafx.util.Pair<Double,Integer>> rs, boolean half) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Loops through the ingredient entries and updates the inventory.
      Parameters:
      rs - The list of ingredient pairs.
      half - Indicates if the ingredient amount should be halved.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
      ClassNotFoundException - if the database driver class is not found.
